abstract: Internal Revenue Service data breach underscores ever-growing threat posed by hackers; tips are suggested to help consumers stave off identity theft.
lead_paragraph: Security experts say personal information is already available to those ready to pay for it, but there are ways to discourage online thievery.

headline.main: Five Steps to Secure Your Data After I.R.S. Breach
headline.print_headline: I.R.S. Breach Demonstrates the Need to Guard Personal Data

snippet: Security experts say personal information is already available to those ready to pay for it, but there are ways to discourage online thievery.
